alert.note: Alert for Lafayette; Panola; Yalobusha (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 12 at 6:59PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Lafayette, north central Yalobusha and southeastern Panola Counties through 730 PM CDT... At 659 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Burgess, or near Holly Springs National Forest, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Oxford, Water Valley, Holly Springs National Forest, Springdale, Burgess, Taylor, Shuford and Eureka Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
